title: Game Progress Route
content:
re doing this? Back off. Now.

It seems she is mainly suspicious of you because she has a captured tadpole reacting to the tadpole in your brain, which makes them think you’re a True Soul. You’ll have the following options to respond with:

I am not… a True Soul… Look to the Harpers you saved. Accept your fate. [STRENGTH] Rage against the vines. [WARLOCK] Beseech your patron to help you.

If you choose the fifth option, Mol will intervene and vouch for you. Jaheira will then question how you cou
